input:
# Visualize on https://erd.surge.sh
# or https://quick-erd.surge.sh
#
# Relationship Types
#  -    - one to one
#  -<   - one to many
#  >-   - many to one
#  >-<  - many to many
#  -0   - one to zero or one
#  0-   - zero or one to one
#  0-0  - zero or one to zero or one
#  -0<  - one to zero or many
#  >0-  - zero or many to one
#
////////////////////////////////////


area
----
id integer PK
name text


city
----
id integer PK
name text
code text NULL
area_id integer FK >- area.id


hotel
-----
id integer PK
city_id integer FK >- city.id
code text
name text
address text
desc text


feature_group
-------------
id integer PK
name integer
hotel_id integer FK >- hotel.id


feature
-------
id integer PK
feature_group_id integer FK >- feature_group.id
name text
is_available integer


hotel_image
-----------
id integer PK
hotel_id integer FK >- hotel.id
url text


hotel_facility
--------------
id integer PK
hotel_id integer FK >- hotel.id
facility_id integer FK >- facility.id


facility
--------
id integer PK
name text


room
----
id integer PK
type text
hotel_id integer FK >- hotel.id
original_price integer
discount_price integer


room_tag
--------
id integer PK
room_id integer FK >- room.id


room_image
----------
id integer PK
room_id integer FK >- room.id
url text
